channel.title: How do i make a portal only for admins or mods
channel.description: title say it how do i make a portal for only mods or admins. plz help me. and say where to put that in wich file.

item.title: How do i make a portal only for admins or mods
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

[quote=“eschwin112, post:1, topic:227281”]title say it how do i make a portal for only mods or admins. plz help me.
and say where to put that in wich file.[/quote]

Where you put the codes for making it teleport, which is probably in packet 132, because thats first click object.

Add this before the code:

if (playerRights == 2) {

And this after it:

} else {
sendMessage("You need to be an admin to use this portal");

Thus being:

if (playerRights == 2) {
if (objectID == ####) {
//code here for portal...
}
}else{
sendMessage("You need to be an admin to use this portal");
}

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a portal only for admins or mods
